DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine investigational drug effective safe child seasonal allergic rhinitis .
DOC.brief_title: Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis In Pediatric Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosis seasonal allergic rhinitis . Adequate exposure seasonal ( Spring/Summer ) allergen prevalent geographic area . Exclusion criterion : Have significant concomitant medical condition . Use corticosteroid , allergy med study . Have abnormal ECG laboratory abnormality .
